title: Enchanting Emerald-Kissed Jhumkas with Lustrous Pearls
materials: Finely crafted in 22K Gold-plated alloy with Hyderabadi polish. Embellished with a vibrant Oval-Cut Emerald and dazzling Cubic Zirconia stones. Finished with a single freshwater pearl.
features: These exquisite jhumkas feature an intricate openwork design, reminiscent of traditional South Indian temple jewelry. The central Emerald adds a pop of color, while the delicate pearl enhances the overall elegance. The meticulously crafted jali (lattice) work showcases exceptional artistry and attention to detail.
occasions: and special occasions such as Seemantham
or any event where you want to showcase a touch of traditional grandeur with contemporary flair. Also great for evening parties.
description: These jhumkas are a testament to timeless elegance, blending traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The high-quality materials, including the vibrant emerald and lustrous pearl, ensure lasting beauty. The intricate craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish make this piece a true work of art.
